snippet: A street art campaign has sprung up in the Brentwood section of Los Angeles, an all-politics-is-local protest against a Democratic National Committee fundraiser featuring Mr. Obama at the home of the actress Gwyneth Paltrow.
abstract: A street art campaign has sprung up in the Brentwood section of Los Angeles, an all-politics-is-local protest against a Democratic National Committee fundraiser featuring Mr. Obama at the home of the actress Gwyneth Paltrow.

headline.main: Obama and Paltrow: A Street Artist's Conscious Coupling
